trans-unit.source: Manages ASP.NET Ajax script libraries and script files, partial-page rendering, and client proxy class generation for Web and application services.
trans-unit.target: 管理 ASP.NET Ajax 指令碼程式庫和指令碼檔、 局部網頁呈現和用戶端 proxy 類別產生 Web 和應用程式服務。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Partial-Page Rendering](#partial_page_rendering) - [Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components](#using_the_scriptmanager_control_with_master_pages__user_controls__and_other_child_components) - [Script Management and Registration](#script_management_and_registration) - [Web Service References](#web_service_references) - [Localization](#localization) - [Error Handling](#error_handling) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The ScriptManager control is central to Ajax functionality in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [局部網頁呈現](#partial_page_rendering) - [ScriptManager 控制項使用主版頁面、 使用者控制項和其他子元件](#using_the_scriptmanager_control_with_master_pages__user_controls__and_other_child_components) - [指令碼管理和註冊](#script_management_and_registration) - [Web 服務參考](#web_service_references) - [當地語系化](#localization) - [錯誤處理](#error_handling) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介 ScriptManager 控制項是在 ASP.NET Ajax 功能的核心。

trans-unit.source: The control manages all ASP.NET Ajax resources on a page.
trans-unit.target: 控制管理頁面上的所有 ASP.NET Ajax 資源。

trans-unit.source: This includes downloading [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] scripts to the browser and coordinating partial-page updates that are enabled by using <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 這包括下載[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]瀏覽器及協調使用啟用的部分頁面更新指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the ScriptManager control enables you to do the following: - Register script that is compatible with partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 此外，ScriptManager 控制項可讓您執行下列動作:-註冊局部網頁更新與相容的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: In order to manage dependencies between your script and the core library, any script that you register is loaded after the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] script.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理您的指令碼與核心程式庫之間的相依性之後, 載入您註冊的任何指令碼[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]指令碼。

trans-unit.source: - Specify whether release or debug scripts are sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: -指定是否釋放或偵錯指令碼會傳送至瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: - Provide access to Web service methods from script by registering Web services with the ScriptManager control.
trans-unit.target: -以提供存取 Web 服務方法從指令碼的 Web 服務向 ScriptManager 控制項。

trans-unit.source: - Provide access to ASP.NET authentication, role, and profile application services from client script by registering these services with the ScriptManager control.
trans-unit.target: -提供 ASP.NET 驗證、 角色和設定檔的應用程式服務從用戶端指令碼的存取這些服務向 ScriptManager 控制項。

trans-unit.source: - Enable culture-specific display of ECMAScript (JavaScript) , , and functions in the browser.
trans-unit.target: -啟用特定文化特性和顯示的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)、 瀏覽器中的函式。

trans-unit.source: - Access localization resources for embedded script files or for stand-alone script files by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> control.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化資源內嵌指令碼檔案或獨立的指令碼檔案使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Register server controls that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> or <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interfaces with the ScriptManager control so that script required by client components and behaviors is rendered.
trans-unit.target: -註冊伺服器控制項的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>或<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>介面與 ScriptManager 控制項，讓用戶端元件和行為所需的指令碼會呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>

trans-unit.source: ## Partial-Page Rendering The ability of an ASP.NET page to support partial-page rendering is controlled by the following factors: - The ScriptManager control's property must be `true` (the default value).
trans-unit.target: # # 局部網頁呈現 ASP.NET 網頁的支援局部網頁呈現的功能由下列因素:-ScriptManager 控制項屬性必須是`true`（預設值）。

trans-unit.source: - There must be at least one <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: -必須有至少一個<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>頁面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property must be `true` (the default value).
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>屬性必須是`true`（預設值）。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property is not set explicitly, its value is based on browser capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>屬性未明確設定，其值會根據瀏覽器功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property at run time during or before the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫的值<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>屬性在執行階段期間或之前的頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you try to change this property after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event has occurred, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性頁之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>已發生事件，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: When partial-page rendering is supported, the ScriptManager control renders script to enable asynchronous postbacks and partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 支援局部網頁呈現時，ScriptManager 控制項呈現的指令碼，若要啟用非同步回傳及部分頁面更新。

trans-unit.source: The regions of the page to be updated are designated by using <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的頁面，即可更新區域<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control handles the asynchronous postbacks and refreshes only the regions of the page that have to be updated.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項處理非同步回傳，並重新整理只網頁的區域，必須更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information about partial-page rendering, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關局部網頁呈現的詳細資訊，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the conditions that cause an update, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 多個條件，讓更新的詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components A page can contain only one ScriptManager control in its hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: # # ScriptManager 控制項使用主版頁面、 使用者控制項，與其他子元件 A 頁面上，可以包含階層中的只能有一個 ScriptManager 控制項。

trans-unit.source: To register services and scripts for nested pages, user controls, or components when the parent page already has a ScriptManager control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊服務和巢狀的頁面、 使用者控制項或元件的指令碼至父頁面已經有 ScriptManager 控制項時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the UpdatePanel Control with Master Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) ## Script Management and Registration The ScriptManager control enables you to register script that is then rendered as part of the page.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項使用主版頁面](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) # # 指令碼管理和註冊 ScriptManager 控制項可讓您註冊指令碼，接著會轉譯為頁面的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control registration methods can be broken into the following three categories: - Registration methods that guarantee that script dependencies on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] are maintained.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項註冊方法可分成下列三個類別:-保證的註冊方法上的指令碼相依性[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]進行維護。

trans-unit.source: - Registration methods that are not dependent on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)], but that are compatible with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 註冊方法不是依存於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]，但該相容<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: - Registration methods that support working with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: -註冊方法支援使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create and use Ajax script in ASP.NET, see [Creating Custom Client Script by Using the Microsoft Ajax Library](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建立和使用 ASP.NET Ajax 指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立自訂用戶端指令碼使用 Microsoft Ajax Library](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Registering Script That Is Dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library You can use the following methods to register script files in a way that guarantees that any dependencies on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] are maintained.
trans-unit.target: 註冊指令碼也就是相依於 Microsoft Ajax Library 您可以使用下列方法可確保任何相依項目上的方式註冊指令碼檔案[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]進行維護。

trans-unit.source: |Method|Definition| |------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A>|Registers a server control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface that is used to define a client object.
trans-unit.target: |方法 |定義 | |------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A>|註冊的伺服器控制項，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>用來定義用戶端物件的介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterScriptControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control renders script that supports the client object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExtenderControl%2A>|Registers a server control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface that is used to define a client object.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項轉譯支援用戶端物件的指令碼。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExtenderControl%2A>|註冊的伺服器控制項，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>用來定義用戶端物件的介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExtenderControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control renders script that supports the client object.| ### Registering Partial-Page Update Compatible Scripts You can use the following methods to register script files that are not dependent on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] but that are compatible with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項轉譯支援用戶端物件的指令碼。 | # # # 註冊局部網頁更新相容指令碼您可以使用下列方法來註冊指令碼檔案不是依存於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相容，但<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: These methods correspond to similar methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會對應至類似方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: If you are rendering script for use inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that you call the methods of the ScriptManager control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您轉譯指令碼內使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，請確定您呼叫 ScriptManager 控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: |Method|Definition| |------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>|Adds a value to a JavaScript array.
trans-unit.target: |方法 |定義 | |------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>|將值加入至 JavaScript 陣列。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the array does not exist, it is created.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>|Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列不存在，就會建立。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>|呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`<form>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: The script is specified as a string parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>|Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼指定為字串參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>|呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`<form>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The script content is specified by setting the `src` attribute to a URL that points to a script file.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>|Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 設定來指定指令碼內容`src`屬性設定為指向指令碼檔案的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>|呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`<form>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The script content is specified with a resource name in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼內容指定的組件中的資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `src` attribute is automatically populated with a URL by a call to an HTTP handler that retrieves the named script from the assembly.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A>|Renders a custom name/value attribute pair (an expando) in the markup for a specified control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A>|Renders a hidden field.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>|Registers a script that is executed in response to the `form` element's `submit` event.
trans-unit.target: `src`屬性會自動填入 URL 從組件中擷取的已命名的指令碼為 HTTP 處理常式呼叫。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A>|呈現指定控制項的標記中的自訂名稱/值屬性組 (expando)。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A>|會呈現隱藏的欄位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>|註冊會在回應中執行指令碼`form`項目的`submit`事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `onSubmit` attribute references the specified script.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>|Renders a startup script block just before the page's closing `</form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: `onSubmit`屬性將會參考指定的指令碼。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>|呈現頁面的右之前啟動指令碼區塊`</form>`標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: The script to render is specified as a string parameter.| When you register methods, you specify a type/key pair for that script.
trans-unit.target: 要轉譯的指令碼指定為字串參數。 | 當您註冊方法時，您會指定該指令碼的類型/金鑰組。

trans-unit.source: If a script with the same type/key pair is already registered, a new script is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未註冊具有相同的型別/金鑰組的指令碼，新的指令碼未註冊。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you register a script with a type/resource name pair that already exists, the `script` element that references the resource is not added again.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果您註冊的指令碼的資源類型/名稱組已經存在，則`script`參考該資源的項目不會加入一次。

trans-unit.source: When you register an expando attribute of a previously registered attribute, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您註冊 expando 屬性的先前註冊的屬性時，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate registration of array values is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許的陣列值的重複註冊。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A> method, avoid registering script that executes inline functions.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>方法，避免註冊執行內嵌函式的指令碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, register script that contains function definitions like event handlers or custom class definitions for your application.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，註冊指令碼，其中包含如事件處理常式的函式定義或自訂類別定義，應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Registration Methods for UpdatePanel Controls You can use the following methods to customize partial-page updates when you use <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: UpdatePanel 控制項您的註冊方法可以使用下列方法來自訂局部網頁更新，當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: |Method|Definition| |------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>|Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>|Sends custom data to controls during partial-page rendering.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>|Registers a dispose script for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: |方法 |定義 | |------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>|將控制項註冊為非同步回傳的觸發程序。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>|在局部網頁呈現期間，將自訂資料傳送至控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>|註冊控制項內部的 dispose 指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The script is executed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼執行時<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>更新或刪除控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The dispose method is used for client components that are part of the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A>|Registers a control as a trigger for a full postback.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法用於用戶端元件屬於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]且具有以釋出資源，無法再使用元件時。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A>|將控制項註冊完整頁面的回傳的觸發程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is used for controls inside an control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.| ## Web Service References You can register a Web service to be called from client script by creating a object and adding it to the collection of the ScriptManager control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法來另外執行非同步回傳控制項內部的控制項。 | # # Web 服務參考您可以註冊 Web 服務呼叫從用戶端指令碼，藉由建立物件並將它加入至ScriptManager 控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET generates a client proxy object for each <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會為每個產生的用戶端 proxy 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection to register Web services at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>集合，以在執行階段註冊 Web 服務。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to access Web services in script, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8) and [Calling Web Services from Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何存取指令碼中的 Web 服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[公開 Web 服務與 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)和[從 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼呼叫 Web 服務](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0)。

trans-unit.source: ## Localization The ScriptManager control generates references in the rendered page that point to the appropriate localized script files, which are either script files embedded in assemblies or stand-alone script files.
trans-unit.target: # # 當地語系化 ScriptManager 控制項呈現的網頁指向適當的當地語系化指令碼檔案，也就是其中一個內嵌於組件或獨立的指令碼檔案中的指令碼檔案中產生的參考。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A> property is set to `true`, the ScriptManager control retrieves localized resources (such as localized strings) for the current culture, if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A>屬性設定為`true`，ScriptManager 控制項擷取目前的文化特性的當地語系化的資源 （例如當地語系化的字串），如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control provides the following functionality for using localized resources: - **Script files that are embedded in an assembly**.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項提供下列功能，以使用當地語系化的資源:-**指令碼會內嵌在組件的檔案**。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control determines which culture-specific or fallback-culture script file to send to the browser.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項決定將傳送至瀏覽器的文化特性或後援文化特性的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: It does this by using the culture-specific <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> assembly attribute, the resources packaged with the assembly, and the UI culture of the browser (if any).
trans-unit.target: 其做法是使用特定文化特性<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>組件的屬性、 封裝與組件和 UI 文化特性的瀏覽器 （如果有的話） 的資源。</xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: - **Stand-alone script files**.
trans-unit.target: -**獨立的指令碼檔案**。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control defines the list of UI cultures that are supported by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項定義的使用支援的 UI 文化特性清單<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **In debug mode**.
trans-unit.target: -**偵錯模式中**。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptManager control tries to render a culture-specific script file that contains debug information.
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項嘗試呈現特定文化特性的指令碼檔案包含偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the page is in debug mode and the current culture is set to en-MX, the control renders a script file that has a name such as `scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js, if the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果頁面是在偵錯模式中，目前的文化特性設定為 en-us MX 控制項呈現的指令碼檔案，例如其名稱`scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js，如果檔案存在。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, the debug file for the appropriate fallback culture is rendered For more information about how to localize resources, see [Localizing Resources for Component Libraries Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，偵錯檔適當的後援文化特性會轉譯如需如何當地語系化資源，請參閱[當地語系化資源元件程式庫概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Error Handling When a page error occurs during asynchronous postbacks, the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: # # 錯誤處理的非同步回傳期間發生分頁錯誤時就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The way in which errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 在該伺服器上的錯誤會傳送至用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Customizing Error Handling for UpdatePanel Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項的自訂錯誤處理](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化所使用的內部欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>追蹤頁面、 控制和部署資訊的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state data collection and state title.
trans-unit.target: 建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊，使用指定的狀態資料集合和狀態標題。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a history point when you want to save more than one key/value pair for the state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來建立記錄點，當您想要儲存的狀態資料的多個索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: If the `title` parameter is `null`, the title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`title`參數是`null`，為狀態中的項目記錄堆疊的標題會使用網頁的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the data for the state.
trans-unit.target: 包含狀態資料的索引鍵/值組的集合。

trans-unit.source: The text that will be added to the browser's history stack as the title for this state.
trans-unit.target: 將加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊新增為此狀態的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state key and state value.
trans-unit.target: 建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊，使用指定的狀態索引鍵和狀態值。

trans-unit.source: The title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack.
trans-unit.target: 為標題的記錄堆疊中的狀態項目會使用網頁的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的索引鍵的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The value part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的值部分。

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state key, state value, and state title.
trans-unit.target: 建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊，使用指定的狀態索引鍵、 狀態值和狀態標題。

trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的索引鍵的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Ajax framework assembly that components on the page use.
trans-unit.target: 取得元件的 Ajax 架構組件的頁面使用。

trans-unit.source: The Ajax framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: Ajax 架構組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how client scripts of the [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client library will be included on the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定如何用戶端指令碼的[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]用戶端程式庫將會包含在用戶端上。

trans-unit.source: Use the AjaxFrameworkMode property to enable all [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] script files, to disable all [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] script files, or to explicitly include individual script files.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AjaxFrameworkMode 屬性來啟用所有[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]指令碼檔案，若要停用所有[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]指令碼檔案，或明確包含個別的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the custom errors section of the Web.config file is used during an error in an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定是否在非同步回傳期間使用 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>非同步回傳期間頁面錯誤時，會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the AllowCustomErrorsRedirect property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器上的錯誤傳送給用戶端的方式取決於 AllowCustomErrorsRedirect 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the custom errors setting in the Web.config file is used to determine error behavior during asynchronous postbacks; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用 Web.config 檔中設定的自訂錯誤來判斷非同步回傳; 期間的錯誤行為，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a page error during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步回傳期間分頁錯誤時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The AsyncPostBackError event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the AsyncPostBackErrorMessage property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique ID of the control that caused the asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得導致非同步回傳之控制項的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The AsyncPostBackSourceElementID property contains the value of the control ID that caused the asynchronous postback, which can be one of the following: - A postback from a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is set to `true` (the default).
trans-unit.target: AsyncPostBackSourceElementID 屬性包含導致非同步回傳，它可以是下列其中一種控制項 ID 的值:-從內部的控制項回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>屬性設定為`true`（預設值）。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: - A postback from a control that is a trigger for an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: -從觸發程序的控制項回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: - A postback from a control that is registered by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: -藉由呼叫已註冊的控制項回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unique ID of a control, if the control has an ID; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項具有 ID，控制項的唯一識別碼否則為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time, in seconds, before asynchronous postbacks time out if no response is received.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出時間 （秒），非同步回傳逾時之前，如果沒有收到任何回應。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the time-out in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示以秒為單位的逾時。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 90 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 90 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"></xref>目前相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>物件，這個屬性就會傳回代表已向頁面驗證服務。</xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: The authentication service can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 驗證服務可以在定義<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項或在相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ASP.NET 驗證服務，或使用自訂驗證服務。

trans-unit.source: You can add the custom service in markup by including an `AuthenticationService` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以包括在標記中加入自訂服務`AuthenticationService`元素內`asp:ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:ScriptManager ID="SM1" runat="server"> <AuthenticationService Path="MyAuthenticationService.asmx" /> </asp:ScriptManager> ``` You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:ScriptManager ID="SM1" runat="server"> <AuthenticationService Path="MyAuthenticationService.asmx" /> </asp:ScriptManager> ```您可以也以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life-cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: 服務會向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>期間網頁的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>生命週期階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager"> </xref>物件目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method that handles the [Sys.Application.navigate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) event on the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定負責處理的方法名稱[Sys.Application.navigate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)用戶端上的事件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method that handles the [Sys.Application.navigate](../Topic/Sys.Application.navigate%20Event.md) event on the client.
trans-unit.target: 處理的方法名稱[Sys.Application.navigate](../Topic/Sys.Application.navigate%20Event.md)用戶端上的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the composite script that supports the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得支援網頁之複合指令碼的參考。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Combining Client Scripts into a Composite Script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d0f608d0-b4c8-4795-990b-ede68c1239b3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[組合到複合指令碼中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d0f608d0-b4c8-4795-990b-ede68c1239b3)。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the composite script.
trans-unit.target: 複合指令碼的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URL to a blank Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定空白網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The EmptyPageUrl property supports Ajax browser history.
trans-unit.target: EmptyPageUrl 屬性支援 Ajax 瀏覽器歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: The URL to use if the target Web page is empty.
trans-unit.target: 在目標網頁為空白時使用 URL。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current page loads client script references from CDN (Content Delivery Network) paths.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前網頁是否從 CDN （內容傳遞網路） 路徑載入用戶端指令碼參考。

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to `true` if you set <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A> to `true` already.
trans-unit.target: 未設定這個屬性為`true`如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A>至`true`已經。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if client script references are loaded from CDN paths, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用戶端指令碼參考從 CDN 路徑，否則載入<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables local copy of a script to load in the event that the CDN (Content Delivery Network) is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 可讓指令碼來載入，CDN （內容傳遞網路） 是無法使用的本機副本。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the fallback CDN value is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用後援 CDN 值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Web page supports history point management.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示網頁是否支援記錄點管理。

trans-unit.source: Use the EnableHistory property to enable history management in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用記錄管理在網頁中的使用 EnableHistory 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Web page supports adding history points to the browser's history stack; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果網頁支援將記錄點加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether public static page methods in an ASP.NET page can be called from client script.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫 ASP.NET 網頁中的公用靜態網頁方法。

trans-unit.source: You can add static page methods to an ASP.NET page and mark them as Web methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將靜態網頁方法加入至 ASP.NET 網頁，並將它們標示為 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then call these methods from script as if they were part of a Web service, but without creating a separate .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以從指令碼呼叫這些方法，就如同 Web 服務，但是沒有建立個別的.asmx 檔案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: To create Web methods on a page, import the <xref:System.Web.Services> namespace and add a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute to each static method that you want to expose.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立在頁面上的 Web 方法，匯入<xref:System.Web.Services>命名空間和新增<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>屬性設定為每個您想要公開的靜態方法。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services>

trans-unit.source: The methods must be marked public.
trans-unit.target: 方法必須標記為 public。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[公開 Web 服務與 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if static page methods on an ASP.NET page can be called from client script as Web methods; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫 ASP.NET 網頁上的靜態網頁方法，以 Web 方法;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables partial rendering of a page, which in turn enables you to update regions of the page individually by using <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會啟用局部呈現功能可讓您使用個別更新網頁的區域頁面<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Even if the EnablePartialRendering property is `true`, partial-page rendering might not occur.
trans-unit.target: 即使 EnablePartialRendering 屬性`true`，在局部網頁呈現可能不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The browser might not support partial-page rendering, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器可能不支援局部網頁呈現或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the value of the EnablePartialRendering property at run time during or before the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在執行階段期間或之前的頁面覆寫 EnablePartialRendering 屬性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: If you try to change this property after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event has occurred, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性頁之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>已發生事件，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if partial rendering is enabled and full-page updates are suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果有啟用局部呈現，並歸併整頁的更新。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The EnablePartialRendering property is set after the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: EnablePartialRendering 屬性設定後在頁面的<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control renders script that supports parsing and formatting of culture-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控制項呈現支援的特定文化特性資訊格式化和剖析的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableScriptGlobalization property is set to `true`, globalized ECMAScript (JavaScript) functions such as the method display culture-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 當 EnableScriptGlobalization 屬性設定為`true`，全球化的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 函數，例如，方法會顯示特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The culture can be set in the browser, in server code, or in the Web site's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器、 伺服端程式碼，或在網站的組態檔中，可以設定文化特性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if culture-specific information can be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以顯示文化特性資訊。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control renders localized versions of script files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控制項呈現當地語系化的版本的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableScriptLocalization property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object will retrieve script files for the current culture if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 當 EnableScriptLocalization 屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>物件將會擷取目前的文化特性的指令碼檔案，如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, a page might specify a script file that is named CustomScript.js.
trans-unit.target: 例如，頁面可能會指定名為 CustomScript.js 的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the culture is set to fr-CA, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object will try to retrieve a script file that is named CustomScript.fr-CA.js.
trans-unit.target: 如果文化特性設定為 FR-CA<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>物件將會嘗試擷取名為 CustomScript.fr CA.js 指令碼檔。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To prevent a script file from being rendered two times, the EnableScriptLocalization property must not be modified during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以防止在轉譯的指令碼檔案兩次，EnableScriptLocalization 屬性不得修改在非同步回傳期間。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if localized script files will be rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果將呈現當地語系化的指令碼檔案。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encrypt the history state string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要將記錄狀態字串加密。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the history state string should be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果記錄狀態字串應該加密。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> instance for a given <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>執行個體指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this static method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control is on a page, or to access the properties and methods of a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control when you do not know its ID.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個靜態方法來決定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項是在頁面上，或若要存取的屬性和方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制當您不知道它的 id。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The page instance to retrieve the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: 頁面執行個體，以擷取<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>從。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> instance for the selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no instance is defined.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>針對選取的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不定義任何執行個體。

trans-unit.source: page is .
trans-unit.target: pageis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declarations that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告先前向的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains the array declarations.
trans-unit.target: 包含陣列宣告的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of client script blocks that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之先前向用戶端指令碼區塊的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Client script blocks are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control for use with a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼區塊會向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>內部的控制項一起使用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains client script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 包含用戶端指令碼區塊的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_dispose" name="dispose" href=""></xref> scripts that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取唯讀的集合<xref uid="langword_csharp_dispose" name="dispose" href=""></xref>指令碼先前向<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A `dispose` script executes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: A`dispose`指令碼時執行<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>更新或刪除控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_dispose" name="dispose" href=""></xref> scripts.
trans-unit.target: 泛型集合，其中包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_dispose" name="dispose" href=""></xref>指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of custom (expando) attributes that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取自訂 (expando) 屬性先前向的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute is a name/value pair that can be read and set by client script.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性是名稱/值組，可以讀取及設定用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 泛型集合，其中包含自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of hidden fields that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取隱藏欄位先前向的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: 包含隱藏的欄位的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_onsubmit" name="onsubmit" href=""></xref> statements that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取唯讀的集合<xref uid="langword_csharp_onsubmit" name="onsubmit" href=""></xref>陳述式先前向<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An `onsubmit` statement is ECMAScript (JavaScript) that is executed when the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: `onsubmit`陳述式是在送出表單時所執行的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_onsubmit" name="onsubmit" href=""></xref> statements.
trans-unit.target: 泛型集合，其中包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_onsubmit" name="onsubmit" href=""></xref>陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of startup scripts that were previously registered with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取啟始指令碼先前向的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A startup script is client script that is associated with a control that executes when the control is started.
trans-unit.target: 啟動指令碼會執行啟動控制項時的控制項相關聯的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains startup scripts.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟始指令碼的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains key/value pairs that represent the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 擷取字串，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表網頁的狀態。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the key/value pairs that represent the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含表示網頁的狀態索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the debug versions of client script libraries will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否要呈現用戶端指令碼程式庫的偵錯版本。

trans-unit.source: The IsDebuggingEnabled property returns `false` when any one of the following conditions is true: - In the element of the configuration file, the `retail` attribute is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: IsDebuggingEnabled 屬性會傳回`false`任一下列條件為 true 時:-在組態檔中，項目`retail`屬性設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: This overrides all other settings.
trans-unit.target: 這會覆寫所有其他設定。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> property is set to `Auto` or to `Inherit`, and debugging is not enabled in the `compilation` section of the application-root Web.config file.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current postback is executing in partial-rendering mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的回傳執行以局部呈現模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsNavigating property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsNavigating 屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate>在引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate"></xref> is being handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate"></xref>正在處理，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reads form data that is posted from the browser to the server, and determines the source of the asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 讀取表單資料，從瀏覽器張貼至伺服器，並決定非同步回傳的來源。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is primarily used by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Selectionlist 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充功能的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all the incoming post data.
trans-unit.target: 所有傳入之張貼資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控制項的狀態已變更; 回傳的結果否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scripts are loaded before or after markup for the page UI is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在頁面載入 UI 的標記之前或之後載入指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The LoadScriptsBeforeUI property determines how scripts in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection are loaded relative to the markup for the page UI.
trans-unit.target: LoadScriptsBeforeUI 屬性會決定如何在指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>集合載入網頁 UI 的標記相。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the LoadScriptsBeforeUI property is `true`, a `script` element is rendered before the page's UI markup is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 當 LoadScriptsBeforeUI 屬性是`true`、`script`項目會呈現在載入網頁的 UI 的標記之前。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, if UI elements are defined in scripts, the UI will be fully functional when it loads.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，UI 項目所定義的指令碼中 UI 會正常載入時。

trans-unit.source: However, if the script accesses UI elements in the markup for which instances have not yet been created, an error might occur.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果指令碼存取的執行個體有尚未建立在標記中的 UI 項目，就可能會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that UI elements are loaded before you access them, handle the event of the class.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定 UI 項目會載入前存取它們，處理之事件的類別。

trans-unit.source: When the LoadScriptsBeforeUI property is `false`, a `script` element is rendered after the page's UI markup is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 當 LoadScriptsBeforeUI 屬性是`false`、`script`項目會呈現在呈現網頁的 UI 標記之後。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the UI loads more quickly, but it might not be fully functional if scripts that define additional UI elements have not finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，UI 載入速度更快，但它可能無法完全正常運作如果定義其他 UI 項目的指令碼尚未完成載入。

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to `true` if you set <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A> to `true` already.
trans-unit.target: 未設定這個屬性為`true`如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A>至`true`已經。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if scripts are loaded before markup for the UI is loaded; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if scripts are loaded after markup for the UI is loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果之前載入指令碼被載入 UI 的標記。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果在載入 UI 的標記之後載入指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下瀏覽器的**回**或**向前** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下瀏覽器的**回** 按鈕，瀏覽器巡覽先前檢視過的 Url，可以包含具有記錄點狀態資料的 Url。

trans-unit.source: If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page.
trans-unit.target: 如果在網頁中的用戶端程式碼偵測到此 URL 包含記錄狀態資料，而進行要求 [伺服器] 頁面。

trans-unit.source: This acts as a postback event, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> server control raises the `Navigate` event.
trans-unit.target: 這可以做為回傳事件，而<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>伺服器控制項引發`Navigate`事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件，並重新建立使用傳遞的狀態資料與事件的 視需要在 Web 應用程式頁面。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>非同步回傳期間頁面錯誤時，會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器上的錯誤傳送給用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error event data.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event and makes sure that only one <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control exists on the page.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件，並確定只有一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>存在該頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event data.

trans-unit.source: The event data.

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveCompositeScriptReference"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 物件，代表目前的指令碼。

trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"></xref>目前相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the profile service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>這個屬性所傳回的物件都代表與網頁註冊設定檔服務。</xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: The profile service can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以在定義設定檔服務<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項或在相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET profile service or use a custom profile service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ASP.NET 設定檔服務，或使用自訂設定檔服務。

trans-unit.source: You can add the custom service in markup by including a `ProfileService` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以包括在標記中加入自訂服務`ProfileService`元素內`asp:ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:ScriptManager ID="SM1" runat="server"> <ProfileService LoadProperties="propertyA,propertyB" Path="MyProfileService.asmx" /> </asp:ScriptManager> ``` You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:ScriptManager ID="SM1" runat="server"> <ProfileService LoadProperties="propertyA,propertyB" Path="MyProfileService.asmx" /> </asp:ScriptManager> ```您可以也以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life-cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: 服務會向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>期間網頁的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>生命週期階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager"> </xref>物件目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Processes a postback event raised by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control and loads the history state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 處理所引發的回傳事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控制並載入網頁的記錄狀態。

trans-unit.source: A string of key/value pairs that represent the history state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 表示網頁的記錄狀態索引鍵/值組的字串。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控制當回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is primarily used by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充功能的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declaration with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control for use with a control that is inside an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control, and adds the array to the page.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告，以與<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>內部的控制項一起使用控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項，然後將陣列加入至頁面。

trans-unit.target: arrayNameis .

trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declaration with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control for use with a control that is inside an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control, and adds the array to the page.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告，以與<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>內部的控制項一起使用控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項，然後將陣列加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: You use the RegisterArrayDeclaration method to register a client script array that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 RegisterArrayDeclaration 方法註冊用戶端指令碼陣列相容於局部網頁呈現，且具有無[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: This method registers the array every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會註冊每次非同步回傳發生時的陣列。

trans-unit.source: To register an array for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control so that the array is registered only when the panel is updated, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊的陣列，內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項，以便只在更新面板時註冊的陣列，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>這個方法多載。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: If you want to register an array that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the array only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊陣列，並不適用於部分頁面更新，而且您想要註冊陣列一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The page object that is registering the array.

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項註冊為非同步回傳的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterAsyncPostBackControl method enables you to register Web server controls as triggers so that they perform an asynchronous postback instead of a synchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: RegisterAsyncPostBackControl 方法可讓您的 Web 伺服器控制項註冊為觸發程序，使他們執行非同步回傳而不是同步回傳。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is set to `true` (which is the default), postback controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control are automatically registered as asynchronous postback controls.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制設為 `true` （此為預設值），回傳控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項就會自動註冊為非同步回傳的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the RegisterAsyncPostBackControl method to register controls outside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control as triggers for asynchronous postbacks, and to potentially update the content of an update panel.
trans-unit.target: 登錄之外的控制項使用 RegisterAsyncPostBackControl 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>為觸發程序的非同步回傳，並可能會更新更新面板的內容控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: To update an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control programmatically, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>以程式設計方式控制，請呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增觸發程序以宣告方式使用`Triggers`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，使用設計工具的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The control to register for asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊為非同步回傳的控制項。

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: The registered control does not implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.INamingContainer"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler"></xref> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的控制項不會實作<xref href="System.Web.UI.INamingContainer"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Registers a client script block with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control for use with a control that is inside an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control, and then adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 註冊用戶端指令碼區塊，以與<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>內部的控制項一起使用控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項，然後再將指令碼區塊加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: You use the RegisterClientScriptBlock method to register a client script block that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 RegisterClientScriptBlock 方法註冊用戶端指令碼區塊相容於局部網頁呈現，且具有無[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/add/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: Client script blocks that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when `control` represents a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that is being updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法註冊的用戶端指令碼區塊會傳送至網頁時，才`control`代表內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>正在更新的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: To register a script block every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊指令碼區塊每次非同步回傳發生時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>這個方法多載。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊的指令碼區塊並不適用於部分頁面更新，而且您想要註冊指令碼區塊一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>頁的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: If `addScriptTags` is `true`, the RegisterClientScriptBlock method adds `<script>` tags around the script block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`addScriptTags`是`true`，RegisterClientScriptBlock 方法會將`<script>`周圍的指令碼區塊的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` if you want to create `<script>` tags yourself, such as when you want to set the attributes of specific `<script>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`false`如果您想要建立`<script>`標籤，例如當您想要設定的特定屬性`<script>`標記。

trans-unit.source: If `addScriptTags` is `false` and the `script` parameter contains multiple script blocks, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`addScriptTags`是`false`和`script`參數包含多個指令碼區塊，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterClientScriptBlock method adds a script block to the page after the opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: RegisterClientScriptBlock 方法將指令碼區塊加入網頁之後開啟`<form>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The script blocks are not guaranteed to be output in the same order in which they are registered.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊不保證其所註冊的順序相同的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If the order of the script blocks is important, concatenate your script blocks into a single string (for example, by using the <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object), and then register them as a single client script block.
trans-unit.target: 如果指令碼區塊的順序很重要，將指令碼區塊串連成單一字串 (例如，藉由使用<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>物件)，然後做為單一用戶端指令碼區塊加以註冊。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The control that is registering the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 控制項註冊用戶端指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: The type of the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼區塊的類型。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 RegisterClientScriptInclude 方法在局部網頁更新註冊 頁面或頁面參與的一部分的用戶端指令碼檔。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterClientScriptInclude method registers a client script file on the page by rendering a `script` element whose opening tag contains a `src` attribute.
trans-unit.target: RegisterClientScriptInclude 方法註冊用戶端指令碼檔案，頁面上的所呈現`script`其開頭的標記包含的項目`src`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `url` parameter is used to set the `src` attribute.
trans-unit.target: `url`參數用來設定`src`屬性。

trans-unit.source: To resolve URLs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決的 Url，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the context of the URL it is called for to resolve the path.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用針對呼叫解析路徑的 URL 的內容。

trans-unit.source: Both the RegisterClientScriptInclude and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A> methods render script files to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個 RegisterClientScriptInclude 和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>方法轉譯至瀏覽器的指令碼檔案。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a script with the same type and key (for a script file) or the same type and resource name (for an embedded resource) is already rendered, the script is not rendered again.
trans-unit.target: 如果已轉譯具有相同的型別 （適用於指令碼檔案） 的索引鍵或相同的型別和資源名稱 （適用於內嵌的資源） 的指令碼，指令碼不會轉譯一次。

trans-unit.source: When you register a script file with this method, the script is rendered every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此方法註冊的指令碼檔案時，指令碼會轉譯每次非同步回傳發生時。
